HI .


I'm Sunil Ghalan, a dedicated mountaineer and filmmaker based in the heart of adventure. With a passion for scaling new heights and capturing breathtaking moments, I have explored the world's most challenging peaks. My journey not only involves conquering mountains but also telling their stories through the lens of my camera. Through my films, I aim to share the raw beauty, challenges, and triumphs of the mountains. Join me on this incredible journey, and let's explore the world together through the eyes of a mountaineer and filmmaker.
